resources.string:
What\'s new with Field Nation

Further stability tweaks to make managing and completing your work as easy as possible.

What we added:
  • User enabled offline mode. Allowing you to continue working when you know there will be no network connection.
  • The ability to remove an assignment outside of the confirmation window
  • Automatic photo compression with an opt-in to upload full resolution
  • Display of Trust & Safety Protection
What we changed:
  • Work order syncing can no longer be scheduled overnight
  • Work orders will be synced when using offline mode
Bugs we fixed:
  • App crashing when tapping on payments
  • Inaccuracy of work order list counts
  • Photo uploads and tasks related crashes
  • MP3 and PDF deliverable preview crashes
